channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- NTFS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- NTFS

item.title: CVE-2018-0822|2024-09-17T04:19:42.765Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- ntfs
item.description: NTFS in Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703 and 1709, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server, version 1709 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to the way NTFS handles objects, aka "Windows NTFS Global Reparse Point Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
